Package propra22.q8493367.draw.controller

Interface IDrawPanelController

All Known Implementing Classes:
DrawPanelController
public interface IDrawPanelController
The interface for the draw panel controller.

  • Method Details

    • pointSetIsEmpty

      boolean pointSetIsEmpty()
      Returns true, if there are no points registered in the draw panel model.
      Returns:
      true, if there are no points registered in the point set

    • createNewDrawPanel

      void createNewDrawPanel()
      Creates a new empty draw panel.

    • undoCommand

      void undoCommand()
      Undoes a command.

    • redoCommand

      void redoCommand()
      Redoes a command.

    • undoIsEnabled

      boolean undoIsEnabled()
      Undo is enabled.
      Returns:
      True, if there are commands which can be undone, false otherwise.

    • redoIsEnabled

      boolean redoIsEnabled()
      Redo is enabled.
      Returns:
      True, if there are commands which can be redone, false otherwise.

    • updateModel

      void updateModel()
      Updates the model (of the draw panel).

    • updateView

      void updateView()
      Updates the draw panel.

    • clearModel

      void clearModel()
      Removes all points from the model (i.e. the point set and the hull)

    • insertPointToPointSetByUserInput

      void insertPointToPointSetByUserInput(int x, int y)
      Insert a point into the point set if the user enters the point on the user interface. Model is updated afterwards.
      Parameters:
      x - the x
      y - the y

    • insertPointToPointSetByFileInput

      void insertPointToPointSetByFileInput(int x, int y)
      Insert point to point set from file input. Model is not updated afterwards.
      Parameters:
      x - - the x coordinate of the point
      y - - the y coordinate of the point

    • deletePointFromPointSetByUserInput

      void deletePointFromPointSetByUserInput(int mouseX, int mouseY, double totalScale)
      Deletes a point from the point set as result of an action by the user.
      Parameters:
      mouseX - the mouse X
      mouseY - the mouse Y
      totalScale - the total scale

    • initializePointDrag

      void initializePointDrag(int mouseX, int mouseY, double totalScale)
      Initializes a point drag.
      Parameters:
      mouseX - the x coordinate of the mouse which is the starting x coordinate of the drag
      mouseY - the y coordinate of the mouse which is the starting y coordinate of the drag
      totalScale - the total scale

    • dragPoint

      void dragPoint(int mouseX, int mouseY)
      Drags a point after the point drag has been initialized.
      Parameters:
      mouseX - the x coordinate of the mouse
      mouseY - the y coordinate of the mouse

    • terminatePointDrag

      void terminatePointDrag(int mouseX, int mouseY)
      Terminates a point drag. Called, when the user releases the mouse or the alt button. If the point set contains a point with the same coordinates as the dragged point after dragging, this point is deleted from the point set.
      Parameters:
      mouseX - the x coordinate of the mouse
      mouseY - the y coordinate of the mouse

    • convexHullIsShown

      boolean convexHullIsShown()
      Returns true, if the convex hull is shown, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true, if the user chose to display the convex hull on the draw panel.

    • diameterIsShown

      boolean diameterIsShown()
      Returns true, if the diameter is shown, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true, if the user chose to display the diameter on the draw panel.

    • quadrangleIsShown

      boolean quadrangleIsShown()
      Returns true, if the quadrangle is shown, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true, if the user chose to display the quadrangle on the draw panel.

    • triangleIsShown

      boolean triangleIsShown()
      Returns true, if the triangle is shown, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true, if the user chose to display the triangle on the draw panel.

    • animationIsShown

      boolean animationIsShown()
      Returns true, if the animation is shown, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true, if successful

    • setShowConvexHull

      void setShowConvexHull(boolean b)
      Determines, if the convex hull should be shown.
      Parameters:
      b - true, if the convex hull should be shown. False otherwise.

    • setShowDiameter

      void setShowDiameter(boolean b)
      Determines whether the diameter is to be shown.
      Parameters:
      b - true, if the diameter should be shown. False otherwise.

    • setShowQuadrangle

      void setShowQuadrangle(boolean b)
      Determines whether the quadrangle is to be shown.
      Parameters:
      b - true, if the convex hull should be shown. False otherwise.

    • setShowTriangle

      void setShowTriangle(boolean b)
      Determines whether the triangle is to be shown.
      Parameters:
      b - true, if the triangle should be shown. False otherwise.

    • setShowAnimation

      void setShowAnimation(boolean animationIsShown)
      Determines whether the animation is to be running.
      Parameters:
      animationIsShown - true if the animation should be shown.False otherwise

    • initializeView

      void initializeView()
      Initializes the view

    • insertRandomPoints

      void insertRandomPoints(int number, int minX, int minY, int maxX, int maxY)
      Insert random points.
      Parameters:
      number - the number of random points to be inserted
      minX - the minimum x coordinate which the points are allowed to have
      minY - the minimum y coordinate which the points are allowed to have
      maxX - the maximum x coordinate which the points are allowed to have
      maxY - the maximum y coordinate which the points are allowed to have

    • addObserver

      void addObserver(IDrawPanelControllerObserver observer)
      Adds an observer.
      Parameters:
      observer - the observer which is added

    • removeObserver

      void removeObserver(IDrawPanelControllerObserver observer)
      Removes an observer.
      Parameters:
      observer - the observer which is removed

    • notifyObservers

      void notifyObservers()
      Notifies all observers.

    • reset

      void reset()
      Reset the draw panel controller. This method is used, if a new point set is loaded from a file or if a new draw panel is created.
